participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: Creative and passionate about cooking, Lily is a night owl who enjoys expressing herself through music and writing.
participant_1.background: I am a chef, and I keep my hand-eye coordination and stamina in shape by playing the drums. I want to write a book before I die. I am a night owl. I am a 30 year old female. I usually dye my hair with natural colors, but I'm open to trying new things.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Easy-going and adventurous, Jake loves the thrill of skating and has a soft spot for animals and Italian cuisine.
participant_2.background: I wake up and put on my favorite name band shirt before heading out to the skatepark. I am looking for someone. I collect recipes for my favorite foods, including Italian dishes and hot wings. I'm obsessed with animals. My favorite show is Scooby-Doo.

content.text: I'm doing well, thanks for asking! What about you?
I'm doing pretty good, thanks. Just got home from a long day at the skate park.
Oh that sounds fun! I've never been to a skate park before. What's it like?
It's really fun! You can go around and do tricks on the ramps and rails. It's a great way to get some exercise and have some fun.
That sounds awesome! I might have to check it out sometime.
You should! It's a lot of fun. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to cook, play the drums, and write. I also love animals.
Oh wow, you sound like a really interesting person! I love to cook too! What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love to cook Italian food. I make a mean lasagna!
Oh man, I love lasagna! I make a pretty good one myself.
We should have a lasagna cook off sometime!
That would be awesome! I'm sure we'd both make delicious lasagna.
